title: Dynabook refreshes its Portégé laptops with 12th-gen Intel processors
content:
Dynabook, the company formerly known as Toshiba PC Company, has announced a handful of new business laptops under the Portégé brand. The new Dynabook Portégé X30L-L, X30W-K, and X40L-K are all powered by Intel’s 12th-generation P-series processors, including vPro models, though Intel has yet to share details on them. The Dynabook Portégé X40L is a

The post Dynabook refreshes its Portégé laptops with 12th-gen Intel processors appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Dynabook has announced the brand-new Portégé X40L and refreshed existing models with 12th-generation Intel Core processors and light designs.
